name: 10 Out Of 10 Tables
overview: Tables covers ALL these areas and more! Each of the six games covers these six areas in a different way ensuring that children can practice their tables in a fun, motivating way without any risk of boredom. LEVEL 1: The 2 times table up to 102 LEVEL 2: The 2, 5, and 10 times table LEVEL 2:All the tables up to 5x5 LEVEL 4: All the tabs up to 10x10 LEVELS: The 11 and 12 times table LEVEL: All the tables up to 12x12 This package is designed to ensure that children worldwide can recall their table skillfully In terms of the UK National Curriculum, the first two levels are designed to be in line with level 3 of the curriculum. The third covers the rest of the level 3 requirements of the curriculum and these three levels together cover the tables content of Key Stage 1.
